name: Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap
name_original: Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap
description:
Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap is an action, RPG and platformer game developed by Westone. It was originally released in 1989. It was published by SEGA. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap is available on Game Gear and SEGA Master System. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
Ryuichi Nishizawa produced the game. It was directed by Kanako Koyama and Ryuichi Nishizawa. Ryuichi Nishizawa and Shinichi Sakamoto scored the game.
